name: inapplicable
description: None of the codes in the table is applicable in the context of the observing facility.

name: Incident
description: An unexpected event that has (or may have) impacted the observations

name: Intervention
description: Human activity that has (or may have) impacted the observations

name: Severe weather
description: A natural severe weather event that has (or may have) impacted the observations

name: Space weather
description: An event in outer space that has (or may have) impacted the observations
